san francisco: Welcome to the world-famous San Francisco, with attractions for the whole family!
switzerland: Welcome to Switzerland, a country with amazing views and natural beauties
lake tahoe: Welcome to Lake Tahoe, a place with a large freshwater lake in the Sierra Nevada Mountains!
orlando: Welcome to the hot & sunny Orlando, with the world-famous DisneyWorld!
delhi: Welcome to Delhi, the capital of India, a center of political history and lots of family attractions!
mumbai: Welcome to Mumbai, the economic capital of India, with a lot of culture in the form of movies and plenty of family attractions!
paris: Welcome to Paris, home of the Eiffel Tower!
new york: Welcome to New York, the home of the iconic Statue of Liberty!
Welcome to Washington D.C., capital of the United States, and the center of politics!
